attributes.action: Ensure that all couples in stable relationships ( a year and over ) to have EXACTLY the same legal rights as married couples ( entitlement to partners pensions etc..) as in most other European countries
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
To allow the creation of legal parnership contracts such as exist in most other European countries for unmarried couples .
Recognizing that long-term and stable relationships are as valid and loving as marriages and have a positive impact on our society .
